languages.text: "Вы держите десятки безумцев, ежесекундно зрящих в Ша'эиль, и удивляетесь, когда их настигают кошмары Той, Что Жаждет? Ваш род... непроницателен".
"You keep dozens of madmen who are constantly staring into Sha'eil, and yet you are surprised when they fall prey to the nightmares of She Who Thirsts? The sheer thoughtlessness of your kind..."
languages.original_text: "Вы держите десятки безумцев, ежесекундно зрящих в Ша'эиль, и удивляетесь, когда их настигают кошмары Той, Что Жаждет? Ваш род... непроницателен".

traits.locale_text: "You keep dozens of madmen who are constantly staring into Sha'eil, and then you are surprised when they fall prey to the nightmares of She Who Thirsts? The sheer thoughtlessness of your kind..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr haltet Euch Dutzende von Wahnsinnigen, die ständig in Sha'eil starren, und doch seid Ihr überrascht, wenn sie den Albträumen von Ihr, die dürstet, zum Opfer fallen. Wie ungeheuer gedankenlos Euresgleichen doch ist ..."
languages.original_text: "You keep dozens of madmen who are constantly staring into Sha'eil, and yet you are surprised when they fall prey to the nightmares of She Who Thirsts? The sheer thoughtlessness of your kind..."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr haltet Euch Dutzende von Wahnsinnigen, die ständig in Sha'eil starren, und doch seid Ihr überrascht, wenn sie den Albträumen von Ihr, die dürstet, zum Opfer fallen. Wie ungeheuer gedankenlos Euresgleichen doch ist ..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Vous gardez à votre bord des dizaines de fous furieux qui scrutent le Sha'eil en permanence, et vous vous étonnez quand ils succombent aux cauchemars de l'Assoiffée ? L'inconséquence de votre espèce me laisse sans voix... »
languages.original_text: "You keep dozens of madmen who are constantly staring into Sha'eil, and yet you are surprised when they fall prey to the nightmares of She Who Thirsts? The sheer thoughtlessness of your kind..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous gardez à votre bord des dizaines de fous furieux qui scrutent le Sha'eil en permanence, et vous vous étonnez quand ils succombent aux cauchemars de l'Assoiffée ? L'inconséquence de votre espèce me laisse sans voix... »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Tenéis a montones de lunáticos mirando constantemente el Sha'eil, ¿y os sorprende que caigan presa de las pesadillas de la Sedienta? Sois todos unos insensatos...».
languages.original_text: "You keep dozens of madmen who are constantly staring into Sha'eil, and yet you are surprised when they fall prey to the nightmares of She Who Thirsts? The sheer thoughtlessness of your kind..."

traits.locale_text: «Tenéis a montones de lunáticos mirando constantemente el Sha'eil, ¿y os sorprende que caigan presa de las pesadillas de la Sedienta? Sois todos unos insensatos...».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「常にシャーエイルを見つめる狂人を何十人も抱えておきながら、彼らが〈かの渇きたる女〉の悪夢の餌食になったことに驚くのか？なんて軽率さだ…」
languages.original_text: "You keep dozens of madmen who are constantly staring into Sha'eil, and yet you are surprised when they fall prey to the nightmares of She Who Thirsts? The sheer thoughtlessness of your kind..."

traits.locale_text: 「常にシャーエイルを見つめる狂人を何十人も抱えておきながら、彼らが〈かの渇きたる女〉の悪夢の餌食になったことに驚くのか？なんて軽率さだ…」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “你豢养了几十个疯子，让他们一刻不停地盯着纱芮尔。可当他们成为了猎物，落入饥渴女士的噩梦里时，你居然会那么惊讶？真不知道你们这种生物脑子里都在想些什么……”
languages.original_text: "You keep dozens of madmen who are constantly staring into Sha'eil, and yet you are surprised when they fall prey to the nightmares of She Who Thirsts? The sheer thoughtlessness of your kind..."

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
